title: Derive expression from the equilibrium condition
text: Given that in equilibrium vertical tensions from left and right side it the rope evens out weight (2T-vertical $$=$$ mg), and the strand sags $$12$$ degrees below $$(T-vertical=sin(12$$ degrees)*T), solve for T.

title: Derive expression from the equilibrium condition
text: Step 1: Apply the equilibrium condition to derive the expression for tension in the flexible medium. Step 2: Use trigonometric relationships to simplify the expression. Step 3: Clearly show all calculations and units.
